DOC.detailed_description: At present , related research Recombinant Human Granulocyte Colony-stimulating Factor apply AHSCT China . Patients PEG-rhG-CSF group receive PEG-rhG-CSF day +1 transplantation dose 100μg/kg . Patients weight 45kg suggest dose 6 mg . Patients control group receive rhG-CSF day +1 transplantation dose 5μg/kg per day recovery neutrophil .
